name: Reliquary Escape
description:
**Recommend you play in fullscreen  so as not to lose mouse focus.**

This is my first game and my submission to the My First Game Jam: Winter 2021 jam.  

This was my first time coding anything and it was a serious learning experience.  I look forward to doing more jams and working on more projects in the future...and, hopefully, getting better along the way.

Thanks for playing and please let me know what you think.

Music is "Heated Lands" Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)
